item.content:encoded:
The Lucidia metaverse wants to give users a fun and immersive experience by making sure they can use it on many different platforms. This article talks about the platforms on which Lucidia is available, such as Android, iOS, and PC (Windows), as well as the release schedule for these platforms.

 

Platforms: Lucidia is made so that it can be used on more than one platform, so it can be used by more people. The following platforms will have access to the metaverse:

 

Android: Lucidia will work on Android devices, so people can use their phones and tablets to interact with the metaverse.

 

iOS: People with iPhones and iPads will also be able to use and enjoy the Lucidia metaverse, so Apple devices will be compatible.

 

PC (Windows): Users who like a bigger screen will be able to use Lucidia on Windows PCs, which will give them an immersive experience on desktops and laptops.

 

Phased Release Plan: Lucidia will follow a phased release plan for each of its platforms to make sure that features are rolled out and integrated smoothly:

 

PC Version (no integration with blockchain): The first version of Lucidia will be a PC version that doesn’t use blockchain. This will let people explore and interact with the metaverse and give the developers valuable feedback.

 

Mobile Version (with blockchain integration): The first version of Lucidia for mobile devices, which will be available on both Android and iOS, will work with blockchain from the start. This method will make it easier to add blockchain features and improve how they work on mobile devices.

 

Because Lucidia is committed to platform availability, users can access the metaverse on their preferred devices, like smartphones, tablets, or PCs. By using a phased release plan, Lucidia’s development team can fine-tune and improve the user experience, giving Android, iOS, and Windows users a seamless and interesting metaverse in the end.

item.content:encoded:
By combining AI and blockchain technology, the Lucidia metaverse aims to give users a gaming experience that can’t be found anywhere else. Getting the project’s goals of low fees, fast transactions, and a gaming-friendly environment means picking the right blockchain. In this article, we’ll talk about how important it is to choose the best blockchain for the Lucidia metaverse and what to think about when making that choice.

 

The Importance of the Right Blockchain: A good blockchain can make a huge difference in how well the Lucidia metaverse works and how many people use it. With the right blockchain,

 

Allow low transaction fees. If users don’t have to worry about the costs of in-game transactions, they can focus on the different features of the metaverse.

 

Make sure transactions go quickly. If transactions go quickly, the user won’t have to wait long or feel frustrated.

 

Give people a place to play games. A blockchain that supports gaming and its specific needs will make the whole experience better and help the Lucidia metaverse grow.

 

Things to think about when choosing the best blockchain:

Several things must be taken into account when choosing the best blockchain for the Lucidia metaverse:

 

Scalability means that the blockchain should be able to handle a lot of users and transactions without slowing down.

 

Security: Users should feel confident that the platform is safe and secure and that their data and assets are well protected.

 

Interoperability: The chosen blockchain should be able to connect and talk to other blockchains, making it easy to work with other platforms and ecosystems.

 

Developer-friendly: If the blockchain is easy to develop on, Lucidia’s team will be able to make and implement features more quickly, which will benefit the users in the long run.

 

Decentralization: The blockchain chosen should put decentralization first, making sure that no one person or group can control or change the platform.

 

Choosing the right blockchain for the Lucidia metaverse is important to its success because it ensures a user-centered experience with low fees, fast transactions, and a gaming-focused environment. By thinking about things like scalability, security, interoperability, developer friendliness, and decentralization, Lucidia will be able to choose the best blockchain for its innovative metaverse project in the most informed way.

The post The Search for the Perfect Blockchain: Lucidia Metaverse appeared first on Lucidia.

item.content:encoded:
Lucidia is changing the metaverse by combining AI and blockchain technology to make the experience for users smooth, interesting, and rewarding. This article will talk about how Lucidia plans to solve the problems with AI training, including the choice of blockchain, the availability of platforms, and the unique Train2Earn mechanism.

 

How to deal with AI training problems: One of the biggest problems with implementing AI is that algorithms need a lot of training to work well. By getting its users involved in the training and improvement process, Lucidia has come up with a clever way to solve this problem. This method has a number of advantages:

 

Reduced Development Costs: Because Lucidia lets users train the AI algorithms, it doesn’t need to hire a team of AI engineers. This cuts development costs by a large amount.

 

AI that is focused on the user: Since the users train the AI, the algorithms directly respond to their needs and preferences.

 

Constantly Updated Algorithms: As users interact with the platform, the AI algorithms will improve and change, ensuring that it works well and is up-to-date.

 

Growing User Pool: The Train2Earn system gives users a reason to join the Lucidia metaverse, which means there are more users and the AI can learn more from them.

 

Integration of Blockchain and Availability of Platform: Lucidia is committed to using a blockchain that has low fees, fast transactions, and an environment that is geared toward gaming. Even though the specific blockchain hasn’t been chosen yet, this focus will make sure that users have the best experience possible. Lucidia will be available for Android, iOS, and PC (Windows). The first version to come out will be for PC, but it won’t have blockchain integration. The first mobile version, on the other hand, will work right from the start with blockchain.

 

Train2Earn Mechanism: The Train2Earn mechanism is one of the most important parts of the Lucidia metaverse. It is how users get paid for helping to train AI. This incentive encourages users to take part and helps build an ecosystem that is full of life and activity.

 

Lucidia is going to change the way the metaverse works by combining AI and blockchain technologies and using the Train2Earn mechanism to get users involved. This new way of doing things will not only cut down on development costs, but it will also create a platform that is focused on the user and adapts to their needs and preferences, giving them a unique experience.

The post Lucidia Metaverse: Combining AI and Blockchain for an Unexpected User Experience appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: How secured Lucidia Metaverse is
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
A Self-Sovereign Data Store (SSDS) SDK is used by Lucidia Metaverse to manage the storage and access of verifiable credentials. This makes sure that user data and digital assets are handled in a safe and reliable way.   Management of Account Access The SSDS SDK is part of the Lucidia platform and is in charge […]

The post How secured Lucidia Metaverse is appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
A Self-Sovereign Data Store (SSDS) SDK is used by Lucidia Metaverse to manage the storage and access of verifiable credentials. This makes sure that user data and digital assets are handled in a safe and reliable way.

 

Management of Account Access

The SSDS SDK is part of the Lucidia platform and is in charge of creating accounts, encrypting data, and getting into the Vault. Users get into the Vault through a secure username and password system that is encrypted with Key Stretching algorithms like Scrypt or PBKDF2.

 

Changes to the keys and SSO flow

The SDK makes it easy to change keys and manages the CentraPass decentralized OAuth 2.0 single sign-on (SSO) flow, which gives users a smooth and safe experience.

 

Verifiable Credentials

Credentials that can be checked are stored in the SSDS and signed by parties that can be trusted. They can be given to users to store in the Vault, or they can be given back to the user to store on their own. There are different ways to make it easy for these credentials to be shared.

 

Lucidia DID SDK

The Lucidia DID SDK provides a strong and safe way to manage digital identities and assets in the metaverse. It has tools for making, changing, and resolving DIDs (unique, persistent, and verifiable digital identities).

 

Verifiable Data Registry

The SDK has a globally distributed key-value database that acts as a data registry and stores important information about identities and assets in the metaverse. This database is called a “key-value store.” Users can easily get and check these attributes by using the DID resolver component.

 

A plan for digital identity and assets

The schema for digital identities and assets in the Lucidia metaverse is made to hold important information for digital content applications like the Unreal Engine or Unity engine. The schema also has service links for resolving digital assets. These service links are hosted by the issuers, who are the DIDs’ controllers.

 

In conclusion, the Lucidia Metaverse uses a complete system for managing digital identities and assets. This system makes sure that digital identities and assets are unique, interoperable, persistent, and can’t be changed. By using the SSDS SDK and the Lucidia DID SDK, the platform gives users and their digital assets a safe place to be in the metaverse.

The post How secured Lucidia Metaverse is appeared first on Lucidia.

The post How Unreal Engine 5 works in Lucidia Metaverse from a technical standpoint appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
The infrastructure of Lucidia is built on the powerful and advanced Unreal Engine 5 technology. Unreal Engine 5 is a game engine that can be used in many different industries and has been used successfully in the past. The Lucidia metaverse will use the Unreal Engine because it is flexible and has key features that are important for its success.

 

Simulation of physics

The physics simulation system in Unreal Engine makes it possible for objects in the game world to interact in a realistic way. This includes dynamic collisions, object destruction, and ragdoll physics. This makes the game more realistic, which makes it more fun to play.

 

Animation

The animation system of the engine lets developers make complex character movements and animations. This makes the game world feel more real and alive.

 

Artificial Intelligence

The AI system in Unreal Engine lets developers make enemies that can make decisions and respond to what players do. This makes the game more interesting and challenging.

 

Graphics

With features like real-time reflections, dynamic shadows, and physically-based rendering, Unreal Engine’s advanced graphics create a visually stunning and immersive game world that keeps players interested.

 

Sound

The engine’s audio system makes it easy to make realistic sound effects, music, and voiceovers, which are important for adding tension, atmosphere, and emotional impact to a game. This is especially important when Lucidia is used to host virtual events like concerts.

 

Multiplayer: Unreal Engine lets you play games with more than one person, which is a big part of the social experience of a metaverse.

 

Tools

Tools like level design, animation, and scripting that come with Unreal Engine make it easier for developers to make and change game content. This saves them time and money and lets them focus on the creative parts of making games.

 

Overall, the powerful features and capabilities of Unreal Engine 5 make it a great choice for building the Lucidia metaverse. This is because it gives users a realistic, engaging, and immersive experience while addressing common business problems like development time and cost.

The post How Unreal Engine 5 works in Lucidia Metaverse from a technical standpoint appeared first on Lucidia.

item.content:encoded:
In the Lucidia metaverse, users have a variety of opportunities to earn $LUCID tokens, such as through the trade of non-fungible tokens (NFTs), the monetization of their art, skills, or services, the organization of events, or the leasing of virtual real estate. However, in order to enable users to earn tokens while also benefiting the network, the following four major processes have been designed:



Play2Earn Lucidia has formed strategic alliances with industry-leading game development studios such as Cathoen Games, G2Esports, Playhera, and AAA Gaming Studios, amongst others, in order to utilize the Play2Earn platform to develop interactive and insightful gaming experiences. By engaging in games and getting high scores, players have the opportunity to win $LUCID tokens.

 

Learn2Earn

The AI algorithms behind Lucidia’s creation of customised curriculums, which adapt to the users’ learning pace and style, have the potential to completely transform the learning experience. Users purchase courses with $LUCID tokens, and upon successful completion, they receive a return that is greater than the amount they initially spent. Lucidia hopes to entice major corporate players to migrate their training programs on the platform so they can take use of its features.

 

Train2Earn

Users have the opportunity to earn tokens for their participation in the development of artificial intelligence (AI) that is housed within the metaverse. The Train2Earn mechanism provides users with an incentive to devote their time in the development of AI, which helps to cultivate a robust community of AI specialists.

 

Fit2Earn

Lucidia is now offering virtual fitness classes in the metaverse. These programs are brought to you in partnership with 1rebel gym and the best personal trainers. Users are able to track the number of calories they burn using haptic devices such as the Apple Watch, and they can compete with one another on leaderboards to win incentives in the form of $LUCID tokens. The Fit2Earn program offers participants the opportunity to earn incentives while also participating in immersive fitness experiences.

item.content:encoded:
The $LUCID token is the internal currency of the Lucidia metaverse. It is used for all transactions. Here is a detailed list of the different ways the $LUCID token can be used:

 

Gaming

The $LUCID token is used to buy game items, virtual assets, NFT trading, virtual real estate, and do other in-game transactions within the Lucidia ecosystem. This makes it easier for people to play games without having to switch between currencies or payment methods. Users can also use $LUCID tokens to buy access to the game for life or to improve their avatars and profiles. Fans of the Embryo game need $LUCID tokens to feed or change their embryos, making sure that their creatures are unique and strong. $LUCID tokens also let you join tournaments with bigger prize pools.

 

Staking

The staking program in Lucidia gives users rewards for keeping $LUCID tokens in a locked wallet for a certain amount of time. Rewards are given out in the form of $LUCID tokens, so users can buy more tokens and benefit from the growth of the ecosystem. Staking helps keep the network safe and gives users a way to support the platform while making passive income. To get people to stake, they will be offered things like private chats with the development team, access to VIP areas on the map, being put on a whitelist for Lucidia NFT presales, and specific monthly NFTs in exchange for voting rights in the Lucidia DAO system.

 

Marketplace

The idea of the metaverse is deeply woven into Lucidia’s market. All transactions in the Lucidia marketplace will use the $LUCID token to make this integration possible. A gas fee and a small fee paid in $LUCID tokens will also be part of the process of minting.

The post $Lucid Token Use Cases: An Overview appeared first on Lucidia.

item.content:encoded:
With its fast-paced, action-packed combat and a wide range of game modes, Lucidia is a first-person shooter (FPS) game that provides players with an entertaining and immersive gaming experience. The platform allows users to make, share, and modify their own games, giving users the tools they need to have really unique digital adventures.

 

Notable Characteristics:

 

Lucidia First-Person Shooter’s four distinct game modes—campaign, multiplayer, co-op, and battle royale—allow players of all tastes and skill levels to find their perfect fit.

 

Tools for Making Games: In Lucidia, users have access to a full suite of tools for making their own games in a wide variety of genres, including first-person shooters, adventures, strategy games, and more.

 

Gamers can create a unique and engaging gaming experience by customizing their characters and weaponry to suit their preferred playstyle.

 

Teamwork and friendship are fostered in the gaming community through cooperative gameplay, as players work together to achieve missions and kill foes in co-op mode.

 

Many hours of fun may be had in the game’s competitive multiplayer mode, which has modes including deathmatch, capture the flag, and team objectives.

 

Popular multiplayer game “Battle Royale” pits players against one another on a constantly collapsing terrain in an effort to be the last individual or team standing.

 

With a wide variety of game types, skins, and tools for making your own games, Lucidia FPS promises to be an exciting and memorable experience for any player.

item.content:encoded:
Lucidia’s mission is to change the face of esports by giving players, teams, and fans an unparalleled virtual experience. Lucidia provides esports fans with a one-of-a-kind and exciting user experience by combining virtual reality, augmented reality, and blockchain technology.

 

Notable Characteristics:

 

Tokens and awards may be tracked and distributed in a transparent manner thanks to Blockchain technology, which also guarantees the ownership and scarcity of digital assets, ensures the safety of financial transactions, and protects the privacy of player information.

 

Earning and Redeeming Tokens Users can earn tokens and benefits by taking part in platform activities including tournaments, playing games, and even hosting their own events.

 

Partnerships: Lucidia has partnered with Playhera and G2 Esports to provide gamers with an unparalleled, individualized gaming experience.

 

Players of EA Sports games may now collaborate with Playhera, an esports hub platform, to host and attend their own virtual events in the EA Sports universe for the chance to win tokens and other benefits.

 

Partnership with G2 Esports: G2 Esports adds its experience running esports competitions to the metaverse, giving users the chance to compete in and watch live esports events, all while earning tokens and incentives for their time and effort.

 

Both Playhera and G2 Esports boast sizable and interactive fan bases; the former has 150,000 and the latter 12 million Twitch subscribers.
